app.title: Supplementary Materials
app.p: The following are available online at https://www.mdpi.com/1424-8247/12/2/60/s1, Figure S1: Possible candidates for ZIKV infection treatment. These drugs, either repurposed or under development, have shown promising results in treating ZIKV infection in both adult and vertical transmission or neonatal models (see text). All structures from Pubchem Compound Database [ 139].
